text: Nanda Devi () is the highest mountain in the Republic of India. It is also the national mountain of the nation. It is holy to the Hindus, source of the Ganges river. Nanda Devi lies in the state of Uttarakhand. Category:Biosphere reserves Category:Himalayas Category:Mountains of India Category:Uttarakhand Category:National symbols of India
title: Nanda Devi
